Slatington.title: Slatington
Slatington.byline: Slatington is a borough in Pennsylvania's Lehigh Valley region of eastern Pennsylvania.

Slave Lake.title: Slave Lake
Slave Lake.byline: Slave Lake (pop 6,650 in 2016) is a town on Lesser Slave Lake in North Central Alberta.

Slavonice.title: Slavonice
Slavonice.byline: Slavonice is a historic town of roughly 2300 inhabitants in 2022 in South Bohemia, near the border with Austria.

Slab City.title: Slab City
Slab City.byline: Slab City is a community of snow birds, military veterans, anarchists, neo-libertarians and others squatting off-grid in the Sonoran desert near the Salton Sea in southeastern California.
